title: Colorblind Mode Broken? (Singed Poison Not Blue?)
body:
So in the latest patch it states they made Snow-Day Singed more Player friendly, but did that cause Colorblind Singed to break?

I've tried his Black Scourge, Base, and Surfer singed, all 3 are releasing Green Poison while in colorblind mode.

Normally it's supposed to be blue so that colorblind people can actually see it over the same colored green grass.

Just wanna know if this is a change against Colorblind players? Or a glitch?

replies.body: Looks like someone on that other post you commented on was able to get a hard answer from one of the Devs about this color issue. I'm personally guessing it's a glitch as well since green on green doesn't really help colorblind players =\
